data.name: Midpoint Mountains
data.description:
# Midpoint Mountains

Hello fellow traveller!

While foraging for food, you come across two yetis near a mountain. One is at the top and the other is all the way at the bottom. They need a way to communicate and want to find the best place to put a cell tower - will you offer to help them??

You are given the `coordinates` for both yetis. Return the `midpoint` of the line connecting them as a tuple (array for JS).

### Example:

```python
(1, 10) (5, 16)  # Coordinates are passed as tuples (x, y)
(3, 13)  # Midpoint

(-329.903377, -511.34672) (-46.902082, -575.275452)
(-188.4027295)
```

# Input/Output

- `[input]` 2 tuples representing the 2 coordinates `coord1`, `coord2`
- Constraints: `-1000.000000 ≤ coord[i] ≤ 1000.000000` 
- `[output]` 1 tuple representing the `x` and `y` value for the midpoint
